name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **machine learning**, **data engineering**, and advanced **statistics** to deliver high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **coding** with **Python**, and skilled in **optimization** techniques to enhance model performance and efficiency. Strong foundation in **data structures** and **algorithms** to solve complex problems innovatively. 
Expert in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics and real-time processing utilizing **FastAPI**, **Django**, and CI/CD pipelines. Proficient in deploying scalable cloud-native systems using **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices and event-driven architectures. 
Well-versed in compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Experienced in MLOps practices, with effective orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring seamless model training and deployment.
